attributes.name: Marauder Sunderer's Musket
attributes.description: "A Musket reserved for devoted soldiers of the Marauders who have proved themselves fit to lead others."

attributes.name: Marauder Sunderer's Warhammer
attributes.description: "A warhammer reserved for devoted soldiers of the Marauders who have proved themselves fit to lead others."
attributes.parsed_description: "A warhammer reserved for devoted soldiers of the Marauders who have proved themselves fit to lead others."

attributes.parsed_description: A War Hammer reserved for Marauders who have reached the rank of Sunderer.

attributes.name: Mariner's Flaming Greatstaff
attributes.description: "Before crash landing on Aeternum most sailors thought that magic was just a myth. They never could have imagined they'd one day wield such a power."
attributes.parsed_description: "Before crash landing on Aeternum most sailors thought that magic was just a myth. They never could have imagined they'd one day wield such a power."

attributes.name: Marooned Mariner's Spear
attributes.description: "Left on a deserted island with nothing but the clothes on his back and the spear in his hand, he was left to fend for himself against the dangers that awaited."
attributes.parsed_description: "Left on a deserted island with nothing but the clothes on his back and the spear in his hand, he was left to fend for himself against the dangers that awaited."

attributes.name: Marshlight
attributes.description: "Unlike the lights that dance over the marshes, this staff will never lead you astray."
attributes.parsed_description: "Unlike the lights that dance over the marshes, this staff will never lead you astray."

attributes.name: Mary's Last Warning
attributes.description: "When Mary takes out her shield, you know she has no patience left."
attributes.parsed_description: "When Mary takes out her shield, you know she has no patience left."

attributes.name: Massive Frosty Axe
attributes.description: "The edge of the axe is a dark blue hue, much different than the steel present elsewhere."
attributes.parsed_description: "The edge of the axe is a dark blue hue, much different than the steel present elsewhere."

attributes.name: Massive Matchstick
attributes.description: "Lighting a fire has never been easier."
attributes.parsed_description: "Lighting a fire has never been easier."

attributes.name: Master Cannoneer's Musket
attributes.description: With each shot the burning itch in your trigger finger grows more demanding, and also more intoxicating."
attributes.parsed_description: With each shot the burning itch in your trigger finger grows more demanding, and also more intoxicating."

attributes.name: Master Cannoneer's Rapier
attributes.description: While the scabbard and grip are splattered with dried blood, the blade seems to have hardly been used.
attributes.parsed_description: While the scabbard and grip are splattered with dried blood, the blade seems to have hardly been used.

attributes.name: Master Cryomancer's Gauntlet
attributes.description: A magical gauntlet made for a Master Cryomancer, provided its wielder matches its potential.
attributes.parsed_description: A magical gauntlet made for a Master Cryomancer, provided its wielder matches its potential.

attributes.name: Master Ranger's Maplewood Recurve
attributes.description: "Initiation into the order of master rangers was no small feat. Once the trials were completed, you were charged to craft your own bow from maplewood."
attributes.parsed_description: "Initiation into the order of master rangers was no small feat. Once the trials were completed, you were charged to craft your own bow from maplewood."

attributes.name: Master's Call
attributes.description: "The master has ordered your death, there is nothing that can stop it."
attributes.parsed_description: "The master has ordered your death, there is nothing that can stop it."

attributes.name: Masterstroke
attributes.description: "For years the smith honed her craft. At long last, she succeeded. The perfect blade."
attributes.parsed_description: "For years the smith honed her craft. At long last, she succeeded. The perfect blade."

attributes.name: Matthias's Gravedigger
attributes.description: He put them in the ground before he brought them back.
attributes.parsed_description: He put them in the ground before he brought them back.

attributes.name: Maul of the Cursed Exile
attributes.description: "Banishment was a death sentence for most. But through a bargain with some dark power, the exile grew in strength and terrorized his former home."
attributes.parsed_description: "Banishment was a death sentence for most. But through a bargain with some dark power, the exile grew in strength and terrorized his former home."

attributes.name: Maul of the First Enforcer
attributes.description: "Dryad enforcers have defended the sacred places of Aeternum for millenia. When the first enforcer rose from the earth, they were granted a holy hammer, perfect for fighting back outsiders."
attributes.parsed_description: "Dryad enforcers have defended the sacred places of Aeternum for millenia. When the first enforcer rose from the earth, they were granted a holy hammer, perfect for fighting back outsiders."

attributes.name: Memory of the First Ones
attributes.description: "What was once a rudimentary blade now hums with Azoth-infused power."
attributes.parsed_description: "What was once a rudimentary blade now hums with Azoth-infused power."

attributes.name: Mended Wounds
attributes.description: "You are whole again."
attributes.parsed_description: "You are whole again."

attributes.name: Meteoric Decimation
attributes.description: "When you see meteors headed your way... run."
attributes.parsed_description: "When you see meteors headed your way... run."

attributes.name: Meteor Trail
attributes.description: "The fiery trail of a meteor is pure. It is powerful."
attributes.parsed_description: "The fiery trail of a meteor is pure. It is powerful."

attributes.name: Might of the Elder Shaman
attributes.description: "The shamans of Edengrove wield power that most mortals could only dream of."
attributes.parsed_description: "The shamans of Edengrove wield power that most mortals could only dream of."

attributes.name: Miradath, the Corrupted Vision
attributes.description: "Come, see the world as I see it. Let us forge it anew."
attributes.parsed_description: "Come, see the world as I see it. Let us forge it anew."

attributes.name: Mirepaw's Fist
attributes.description: "It takes the strength of a bear to wield such a massive weapon. And the cunning of a bear to know when best to use it."
attributes.parsed_description: "It takes the strength of a bear to wield such a massive weapon. And the cunning of a bear to know when best to use it."

attributes.name: Miscalculations
attributes.description: "Good intentions sometimes lead to undesired outcomes."
attributes.parsed_description: "Good intentions sometimes lead to undesired outcomes."

attributes.name: Mischievous Hare
attributes.description: "Walking through the forest and bopping them on the head."
attributes.parsed_description: "Walking through the forest and bopping them on the head."

attributes.name: Miserable Guard's Bow
attributes.description: "He sought to be an adventurer, but an arrow to the knee forced him into mere guard duty."
attributes.parsed_description: "He sought to be an adventurer, but an arrow to the knee forced him into mere guard duty."

attributes.name: Misery's Cure
attributes.description: "Let me end your anguish."
attributes.parsed_description: "Let me end your anguish."

attributes.name: Misher's Last Word
attributes.description: "Unable to get the last words by talking, Misher resorted to other means."
attributes.parsed_description: "Unable to get the last words by talking, Misher resorted to other means."

attributes.name: Mistwalker's Fire Staff
attributes.name_with_affixes: Mistwalker's Fire Staff of the Scholar
attributes.description: "Fade from sight. It's easy in the swamps. There is always a bog to cross or some brush to slip behind. Let the mists carry you to your prey."
attributes.parsed_description: "Fade from sight. It's easy in the swamps. There is always a bog to cross or some brush to slip behind. Let the mists carry you to your prey."
